validation.tooLong: Enter a name shorter than 32 characters

validation.invalid: Your last name contains invalid characters
validation.tooLong: Enter a name shorter than 33 characters

validation.invalid: Your organization name contains invalid characters
validation.tooLong: Enter an organization name shorter than 26 characters
validation.tooShort: Enter an organization name longer than 4 characters

validation.invalid: Incorrect personal number format (YYYYMMDDNNNN) or checksum

text.cookieBanner.body: This website uses cookies. By continuing you accept the use of cookies.

errors.orderfailed: Your test BankID could not be issued, please try again later.

phonefocus.paragraph: Type your security code in the BankID app and select Identify.

paragraph.desktop: Start the BankID app and press the Scan QR button. Then scan the QR code above.
paragraph.mobile: If your BankID resides on a different mobile device, scan the QR code below with the your device.

codesent.paragraph: Your code has been sent to the email address you entered.
codesent.title: Thank you for your order!

configure.text: How to configure your client for BankID test.

howto.text: Follow this guide to get your test BankID. We recommend using a test device to avoid problems with your production BankID.

guides.subtitle: Useful guides
guides.text: Get a test BankID to use for development or testing of services using BankID. You can also use it for testing functionality such as signing with BankID.
guides.title: Guides

issue.paragraph:
You can issue Mobile BankIDs and BankIDs on file, for test purposes. You decide names and
personal numbers for your test BankIDs.
issue.title: Issue BankID for test

showandblock.error: An error occurred, please check the entered personal number or try again later.
showandblock.paragraph: Enter the personal number of the test BankID you wish to show and/or block. A new page will open.
showandblock.title: Show and block

testsign.disabled: Sign function only available when logged in with BankID.
testsign.paragraph: Test the sign function for a text of your choice, using the BankID you are logged in with. To use sign, you need to be logged in with a test- or production BankID.
testsign.title: Sign

issuefile.paragraph1: Enter a name and personal number for your test BankID on file.
issuefile.title: BankID on file

issuemobile.paragraph1: Enter a name and personal number for your test Mobile BankID.
issuemobile.title: Mobile BankID

issuepages.paragraph2.part1: To issue a test BankID you need to
issuepages.paragraph2.part2: to work with the test system.

login.altSameDevice: Alternative: Start BankID Security Application on this device.
login.title: Select your login method

form.orderNewCode: Invalid code, please order a new code

needcode.text: If you don’t have a production- or test BankID, a personal code can be used. Order one below and receive it via email. Enter it above and click log in.

oldcodes.text: Old codes no longer supported, you need to order new codes or select another login method.

logincode.paragraph1: If you have neither a test or production BankID, you can order a personal login-code to your mail address. Then enter the code and click Log in above.
logincode.paragraph2: you can reuse your personal code as many times as you like for a period of 30 days, so there is no need to order a new code for each personal number you want to issue a test BankID for.

reusecode.text: Your code is valid with unlimited use for 30 days. You don’t need separate codes for different test BankIDs.

logincode.title: Log in with your personal code

notfound.paragraph: We are sorry to say we can't find the page you are looking for.
notfound.title: Page not found

ordercode.blockedDomain: We don't support anonymous email services like mailinator. Please use an actual email address!
ordercode.isGmailHotmail: Customers have reported problems with receiving our activation mails using Gmail and Hotmail. Choose another email address!
ordercode.paragraph1: Enter your details to order a personal code. The code will be sent to the email address you enter.

reusecode.text: Your code is valid with unlimited use for 30 days. You don’t need separate codes for different test BankIDs.

ordercode.title: Order personal code

form.placeholder:
### Heading
This text will be *signed* with your BankID!

sign.paragraph: Here you can test to sign a text of your choice using the BankID you logged in with.

phonefocus.paragraph: Type your security code in the BankID app and press the Sign button.

qrcode.paragraph: Start the BankID app and press the Scan QR button. Then scan the QR code above.

sign.title: Sign test

usermessages.RFA13: Trying to start your BankID app.
usermessages.RFA16: The BankID you are trying to use is revoked or too old. Please use another BankID or order a new one from your internet bank.
usermessages.RFA17B: Failed to scan the QR code. Start the BankID app and scan the QR code. Check that the BankID app is up to date. If you don't have the BankID app, you need to install it and order a BankID from your internet bank. Install the app from your app store or https://install.bankid.com.
usermessages.RFA2: The BankID app is not installed. Please contact your internet bank.
usermessages.RFA4: An identification or signing for this personal number is already started. Please try again.
usermessages.RFA8: The BankID app is not responding. Please check that the program is started and that you have internet access. If you don’t have a valid BankID you can get one from your bank. Try again.
usermessages.RFA9: Enter your security code in the BankID app and select Identify or Sign.
